question: Dr. Patel is looking for a condo that will not go beyond her $330,000 budget. She saw a property that has a selling price of $300,000. On top of that, the buyer has to pay a brokerage fee which is 6% of the selling price, and also the transfer fee that is 12% of the selling price. How much more is the total price of the condo than Dr. Patel's budget?
